DOC.brief_summary: Although uncomplicated cystitis consider mild condition mostly self limiting , patient see doctor treat antibiotic . Antibiotics know give quick relief symptom shorten course condition day . The aim study evaluate ibuprofen versus mecillinam treatment uncomplicated cystitis otherwise healthy , non-pregnant woman . Our main objective see whether symptomatic treatment ibuprofen equally efficient treatment mecillinam group .
DOC.detailed_description: The design study double blind randomize control trial ( RCT ) . Half patient receive treatment mecillinam half receive treatment ibuprofen . The study follow principle Good Clinical Practice ( GCP ) . Urine culture obtain day one two week . The patient give diary daily register symptom load , possible complication adverse effect day feel completely cure . We contact patient two week make sure follow study procedure . After four week perform final interview patient .
